{{Disambig}}

'''Old Growth Taiga''' may refer to:
* {{BiomeLink|Old Growth Pine Taiga}}, a forested biome covered with both large 2×2 and normal-sized spruce trees, with the tall trees being mostly arrow shaped with few leaves at the top.
* {{BiomeLink|Old Growth Spruce Taiga}}, a forested biome covered with tall spruce trees.
